Ich habe Dead by Daylight im Sale erworben und viel gespielt.
An sich ist das ein richtig geiles Spiel. Allerdings steckt es in der Entwicklung fest.
DLC's kommen zwar haufenweise, aber Fixes fÃ¼r Spielfehler kommen leider kaum.

Kurz und Knapp einmal die Vor- und Nachteile:

Vorteile:
- GroÃŸer SpielspaÃŸ mit freunden / einem halbwegs klar denkendem team.
- Horrorfeeling garantiert!
- Viele MÃ¶glichkeiten was Charaktere angeht ( Perks etc. )
- GROOOÃŸEEE AusbaumÃ¶glichkeit fÃ¼r Entwickler

Nachteile:
- Bugs an jeder Ecke!
- Unbalanciertes Spiel des Jahres ( Killer perks OP etc...)
- Momentan viele Hacks auf dem "Markt"
- Matchmaking nicht vorhanden - 3 Rang 20 Survivor gegen Rang 1 Killer *gg*

The game got off to a bumpy start due to bugs, but with some updates it soon became one of the best games in the "slash" franchise, but recently I have doubts about the integrity of the players regarding the use of illegal programs, such as: see through the wall .. Until this is fixed, I do not recommend this frustration to others gamers...

Game crashes constantly. Lobby locks up. Takes forever to load in to a game and by then half the people have left, not wanting to wait. The few times I was actually able to play, the game was really fun. But it's been out since June and it's still this buggy and unplayable? 

No thanks... asking for a refund. What a shame.

TLDR: I wrote a very negative review for this game when I first bought it in 2016. All issues, technical, and gameplay, have been fixed (Oct 2017), and now I love it.

When this game released it crashed constantly. Getting in a game was painfully slow, and when you were in a game it was laggy, or your teammates connections were cut randomly, (dooming you). It was very unprofessional to even call the game "pre-release", it was unplayable and deserved every bad review it got.

Currently as of October 2017, the game is stable, matchmaking is solid and fast, and the game plays very well. Player's are matched very fairly by skill and experience. The game has been tweaked so many exploits or cheats are no longer possible. With all this in mind, I've changed my review from a negative one to a positive one. I'd highly recommend buying this game, and would also recommend when reading reviews, to focus on recent reviews, and ignore the ones from when this game had it's disastrous release.
freaking love this game. The rush you get when the killer is so close, opening the gates to escape, it's just.... omg it's so good
GREAT GAME, lots of bugs that need fixing. And the matchmaking should work better.

This game can be way more fun with friends if you can fix the way we queue up together. I think you should  include a party system in the main menu instead of clicking survive with friends every time a match ends or disconnects. Other than that the game is fun and i enjoy it but it can be way more fun with friends connecting the right way.

Siiiiiiiiigh... Bought this game and was happy at first. but now I realised I should have read the reviews here before purchasing. The game is bugged beyond playable, still not fixed 2017-01-01. Also at a later phase of the game the gameplay is completely reversed. It is more like who harasses the killer the most, instead of survivors trying to hide and sneakingly repair generators. They just farm as most points as possible while the killer is flailing about trying to catch one of them in between getting flashed or stunned by pallets. This is easily fixable by the devs but sad to say they won't. Instead they push out (very little) new content. The bugs about loosing all your gameprogress is still not fixed either. My mate just dropped back to lvl 0.... Seriously Starbreeze, I have been a fan of you since Riddick what is this?!
Editing my review, matchmaking is still a bit slow, but its smoother now. Love the game, highly addicting.
Bel gioco,anche se dopo un po' ti stanca.
Great concept but often very frustrating to play as it's full of bugs and glitches. Is well over due a balancing and some attention to fix the issues.

Start up game
Enter matchmaking lobby
Wait for players
Enter the game
Play as victim
Shit my pants

10/10 would shit my pants again

Takes forever to get into a game with friends! Played 4 odd hours and got into 1 game! The other hours where trying to find a game and me and my friends getting bored and playing a private match, DO NOT BUY!

God Dammit...the game is super Cool...but to get into a game is a ghell...server is always unstable, u get stuck in the waiting screen forever, have to restart every 2 games...its freaking annoying, fix your stuff before releasing something!!
